title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
**Unleash the Ultimate Family Face-Off with Hasbro Gaming's Taboo Kids vs. Parents!**

Are you ready for a hilariously intense battle of wits that pits the savvy of kids against the wisdom of adults? Introducing the **Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game**, perfect for players aged 8 and up!

**Family Fun Night Reimagined!**

Get the whole family together for a fast-paced, laugh-out-loud experience with the game where guessing the right word is just the beginning. With **1000 guess words** spread across **260 cards**, this game promises endless fun and a fresh challenge every time you play.

**Customized Decks for Tailored Gameplay!**

With two specially designed decks - one for kids with familiar words and one for adults with a varied range of terms - everyone gets to join in on the excitement. Each deck contains 130 cards, ensuring a fair and engaging competition.

**Excitement in Every Round!**

Keep the energy high with the included one-minute timer, and be ready to sound the included squeaker when someone slips up! The objective? Get your teammates to guess words without saying the forbidden ones. But beware, slipping up gives your opponents the point!

**Winning Has Never Been So Much Fun!**

Score the most points to claim victory in this thrilling showdown. Whether youâ€™re a kid with quick-thinking skills or a parent with a vast vocabulary, this game will test your ability to communicate under pressure.

**Quality and Trust You Can Count On!**

Brought to you by **Hasbro Gaming**, a brand synonymous with engaging entertainment, this edition of Taboo guarantees a high-quality, durable game set that will become a staple for family gatherings.

**Get Ready for Hours of Entertainment!**

With engaging gameplay elements, a squeaker for added hilarity, and a timer to keep the adrenaline pumping, Taboo Kids vs. Parents is the perfect addition to any game night. So, gather the troops, clear the table, and get ready for a memorable face-off where only one question remains: Who will triumph, the kids or the parents?

**Bring Home Taboo Kids vs. Parents Today!**

Don't miss out on the fun. Add Taboo Kids vs. Parents to your family's game collection and create memories that will last a lifetime. It's more than just a game; it's a family bonding experience waiting to happen!
